summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SmartSaveAI - AI-powered student finance assistant. Tested backend APIs, frontend UI, AI integration, and full user workflows including onboarding, expense management, and financial calculations.

ui_bugs.issue: Warning color (red) not showing when safe daily spend is negative

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby attributes for accessibility

passed_tests: All backend API endpoints (7/7 tests passed)
AI advice generation using OpenAI GPT-5.2
Financial calculations accuracy (Money Left, Burn Rate, Safe Daily Spend)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Safe Daily Spend warning indicator to show red color when value is negative. Add aria-describedby attributes to Dialog components for better accessibility.

success_percentage.frontend: 95% - Minor UI indicator issue with warning colors
